Item ID1319

The rune 2h sword is a two-handed sword that is made of rune. It is stronger than the Adamant 2h sword, while being weaker than the Dragon 2h sword. It can be made using the Smithing skill at level 99 using 3 runite bars and a hammer on an anvil granting 225 Smithing experience. It requires 40 Attack to wield.

The rune 2h sword is often used on free-to-play worlds in player-killing to finish players off because it has the highest strength bonus, equal to the hill giant club, and the highest slash bonuses of all free-to-play equipment.

The rune 2h sword can also be dropped by any monster who has access to the rare drop table.

It is stronger than the [[Adamant 2h sword]], while being weaker than the [[Dragon 2h sword]]. It can be made using the [[Smithing]] skill at level 99 using 3 [[runite bar]]s and a hammer on an anvil granting 225 Smithing [[experience]]. It requires 40 [[Attack]] to wield. The rune 2h sword is often used on [[free-to-play]] worlds in [[player-killing]] to finish players off because it has the highest strength bonus, equal to the [[hill giant club]], and the highest [[slash]] bonuses of all free-to-play equipment. The rune 2h sword can also be dropped by any monster who has access to the [[rare drop table]]. {{Infobox Bonuses |astab = -4 |aslash = +69 |acrush = +50 |amagic = -4 |arange = 0 |dstab = 0 |dslash = 0 |dcrush = 0 |dmagic = 0 |drange = -1 |str = +70 |rstr = 0 |mdmg = 0 |prayer = 0 |slot = 2h |speed = 7 |attackrange = 1 |combatstyle = 2h Sword |image = [[File:Rune 2h sword equipped.png|100px]] |altimage = [[File:Rune 2h sword equipped female.png|100px]] }} ==Creation== {{Recipe |skill1 = Smithing |skill1lvl = 99 |skill1boostable = Yes |skill1exp = 225 |members = No |ticks = 5 |tools = Hammer |facilities = Anvil |mat1 = Runite bar |mat1quantity = 3 |output1 = Rune 2h sword }} ==Combat styles== {{CombatStyles|2h Sword}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Rune 2h sword}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 31 May 2005 |update = New Emotes And Other Tweaks |change = The item was graphically updated. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Rune 2h sword detail (historical).png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:Rune 2h sword detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Rune 2h sword (historical).png|center]] |[[File:Rune 2h sword.png|center]] |- |29 March 2004 ⁠–
